Module com.example.mydmsproject
Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Scenes

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Scenes
public class Scenes extends Object
A model class that stores all scenes, game elements and sounds, act as a mediator between controllers, used for getting/setting scenes and other elements.
Author:
Tianxiang Song

  • Constructor Summary

    • Scenes

      public Scenes(int width, int height, javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      Default class constructor, initialize all the scenes, sounds and set start scene to the stage.
      Parameters:

      height - the height of the stage
      stage - the primary stage
      Throws:
      IOException - signals that an I/O exception has occurred
